detectors.description:
ERC20Token.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UnlimitedAllowanceToken.sol#44-52) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[msg.sender] >= _value && balances[_to] + _value >= balances[_to] (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UnlimitedAllowanceToken.sol#46)
	- balances[msg.sender] -= _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UnlimitedAllowanceToken.sol#47)
	- balances[_to] += _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UnlimitedAllowanceToken.sol#48)
